results.label: Justin.tv
results.description: Justin. tv is a website created by Justin Kan, Emmett Shear, Michael Seibel and Kyle Vogt in 2007 that allows anyone to broadcast video online. Justin. tv user accounts are called "channels", and users are encouraged to broadcast a wide variety of user-generated live video content, called "broadcasts".

results.label: TwitchTV
results.description: TwitchTV is an online video platform (OVP) . TwitchTV is a video game broadcasting and chat community that allows gamers to watch other gamers through either live streaming or recorded replays . The company is headquartered in San Francisco and was created by Justin Kan and Emmett Shear, two of the co-founders of Justin. tv. According to TwitchTV CEO Emmett Shear, there are about 16 million viewers every month with the average viewer watching about an hour a day .
